title.rendered: Data-Driven Computational Analysis for Operation and Control

content.rendered:
RECENT PUBLICATIONS

  1. P. Banerjee, S. Rizvi, A. Srivastava, P. Markham, and M. Patel, “Data-Driven Static Load Model Parameter Estimation with Confidence Factor”, IEEE International Conference on Probabilistic Methods Applied to Power Systems (PMAPS) (pp. 1-6). IEEE, 2018.
  2. Tushar, S. Pandey, A. Srivastava, P. Markham, N. Bhatt, M. Patel, “Data-Driven Parameter Estimation of Steady State Load Models”, IEEE PEDES, Kerala, India, December 2016
  3. S. Biswas, Anurag K Srivastava and D. Whitehead, “A Real Time Data-Driven Algorithm for Health Diagnosis and Prognosis of A Circuit Breaker Trip Assembly “, Special Issue on Real-Time Fault Diagnosis and Fault-Tolerant Control, IEEE Transaction on Industrial Electronics, vol. 62, no. 6, pp. 3822-3831, June 2015
